page.title: 18ATTITUDES
page.content: A few weeks ago class 7 of Hardwicke Parochial School went out to do a survey of the area. Before we went out we made up a questionaire. The questionaire consisted of questions about farming, attitudes, places of interest and historical aspects. My friends and I are going to write about peoples attitudes to different questions. People do like the area. They like it for its walks, bike rides, fresh air and the views. Everyone said it was peaceful and quiet. People prefer the country to the town because in the town you can't get fresh air, go for walks or bike rides. We asked the farmers if they liked working on the farm and if so what was the worst job. None of the farmers had worst jobs but the only job they didn't like was mucking out.
